title: NLP Engine Output
description: Output from the natural language processing engine.

ControlInfo.description: The information about the batch run along with relevant metadata and groupings to inform the UI.

level.description: The title in the output of the metadata being grouped e.g. 'table' or 'recordKey'.

order.description: The mechanism for ordering the data e.g. 'alpha'.

orientation.description: The orientation in the UI of the grouped items e.g. 'horizontal'.

tables.description: Relevant metadata for the document type processed (based on input parameter -t), organized by tables in target destination.

table.description: The name of the destination table'.

fields.description: The possible fields in the destination table.

field.description: The name of the field in the destination table.

closedClass.description: A binary choice of whether or not their is a closed class of possible values for the field e.g. 'False' means there is no given limit to the field values.

datatype.description: The datatype of the output filed e.g. 'string' or 'integer'.

diseaseProperties.description: A list of different 'disease properties' objects, which will dictate possible outputs for various disease groups.

diseaseGroup.description: the name(s) of the appropriate disease group, or '*' for all disease groups.

values.description: An array (possibly empty in the case of an open class) of potential values for this field given the disease group.

errors.description: An array of any errors or warnings encountered in processing the batch

errorString.description: A string describing the source or cause of the error.

errorType.description: The type of error encountered e.g. 'Warning' (most Errors will crash the engine before anything is outtput).

reports.description: Output information for the documents themselves
